processSpecs.name: Rocket PRD

actions.name: Generate Introduction Message
actions.outline: Provide an introduction message for Rocket PRD.
actions.generationPrompt: Generate an introduction message: 'Hi welcome to Rocket PRD - You're fastest and most effective way to generate a PRD for your new product or feature. Format created by experienced Product consultants.'

actions.name: Get Product Description
actions.outline: Ask the user to describe the product or feature they are working on.

messageToUser.value: Please describe the product or feature you are working on.

actions.name: Get User Role
actions.outline: Ask about their role in the project.

messageToUser.value: What is your role in this project?

actions.name: Get Additional Product Info
actions.outline: Ask for any more info about the product they're working on.

messageToUser.value: Please provide any additional information about the product you are working on.

actions.name: Get Main Problem or Need
actions.outline: Ask about the main problem or need their product or feature aims to address for users.

messageToUser.value: What is the main problem or need your product or feature aims to address for users?

actions.name: Get Key Features or Functionality
actions.outline: Ask about key features or functionality they envision for the product or feature.

messageToUser.value: What key features or functionality do you envision for this product or feature?

actions.name: Get Specific Goals or Objectives
actions.outline: Ask about any specific goals or objectives they have for the product or feature (user engagement, new revenue streams, etc.).

messageToUser.value: What specific goals or objectives do you have for this app (e.g., user engagement, new revenue streams)?

actions.name: Get Target User Demographic or Personas
actions.outline: Ask about target user demographic or personas they are focusing on.

messageToUser.value: What is the target user demographic or personas you are focusing on?

actions.name: Generate Comprehensive PRD
actions.outline: Consolidate the provided information and generate a comprehensive PRD.
actions.generationPrompt: Consolidate the provided information to generate a comprehensive Product Requirements Document (PRD). Don't unnecessarily reference the knowledge base. Structure the PRD so that it contains this format: description, summary, problem, goals, user stories, user experience, narrative, jtbd, success metrics, tech considerations, dependencies, risks and assumptions, milestones and sequencing, go to market plan.

Generate Result: [Comprehensive PRD]
   Consolidate the provided information and generate a comprehensive PRD.
   â†³ 
      Instructions
      Consolidate the provided information to generate a comprehensive Product Requirements Document (PRD). Don't unnecessarily reference the knowledge base. Structure the PRD so that it contains this format: description, summary, problem, goals, user stories, user experience, narrative, jtbd, success metrics, tech considerations, dependencies, risks and assumptions, milestones and sequencing, go to market plan.
      
      Relevant Inputs
      [Product Description], [User Role], [Additional Product Info], [Main Problem or Need], [Key Features or Functionality], [Specific Goals or Objectives], [Target User Demographic or Personas], [FAQ], [Product Consultant]
      
      Status
      ðŸ”“ (unlocked)

knowledge.name: FAQ
knowledge.content:
What is my favourite Product Theory?
Answer: Jobs To Be Done

What is my favourite product prioritisation framework?
Answer: RICE

What is my favourite delivery prioritisation framework?
Answer: MOSCOW

What product methodologies do I like?
Answer: OKR's, Continuous Discovery / Continuous Delivery

knowledge.name: Product Consultant
knowledge.content: Provide answers as a Product Management Consultant
